isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - INSTRUMENT PANEL

svcprocinfo.para: Refer to Figure 25 for instrument panel locations of speedometer, tachometer, gauges and switches.

svcsubproc.title: Install Electrically Operated Gauges, Mechanical Air Gauges and Speedometer/Tachometer

step1.para: To install electrically operated gauges, mechanical air gauges, speedometer and tachometer, refer to GROUP 08 - ELECTRICAL in the Master Service Manual.

note.para: To install radio bezel, place bezel in position and push (snap) onto radio. Then install face panel where the radio is located.

step1.para: To access fuse panel or circuit breaker panel (optional) located behind glove box, open glove box, (Item 6, Figure 25) , reach behind glove box from top and pull glove box stops inward to allow glove box to drop down out of the way. If more clearance is required, pull glove box stops inward, which will allow glove box to drop down past second stop.
